topic: How to benchmark ETL jobs using fastapi with Python 3.12+
prompt: Write a Python 3.12+ focused, accurate explainer for: How to benchmark ETL jobs using fastapi with Python 3.12+

response_parsed.title: Benchmarking ETL Jobs Using FastAPI with Python 3.12+
response_parsed.summary: This guide demonstrates how to utilize FastAPI, a modern, fast (high-performance) web framework for building APIs, to benchmark Extract, Transform, Load (ETL) jobs in Python 3.12+.
key_points: FastAPI offers built-in profiling and performance analysis tools
ETL jobs can be integrated into a FastAPI application for efficient benchmarking
Python 3.12+ features such as improved type hints, async/await, and faster startup times contribute to better performance.
Profiling results can provide insights on the time taken by various functions, enabling optimizations.
version_notes: Python 3.12+ is required for improved performance and FastAPI features
FastAPI v0.74.0 or higher is recommended
caveats: Benchmarking results may vary depending on the complexity of ETL jobs, system resources, and other environmental factors.
Ensure to profile multiple times for accurate averages.
